<h2 data-id="heading-0">🌿 前言</h2>
<p>在去年写了一篇关于【<a href="https://juejin.cn/post/7244192313844154424" target="_blank" title="https://juejin.cn/post/7244192313844154424">uniApp新模式: 使用Vue3 + Vite4 + Pinia + Axios技术栈构建</a>】的文章，反馈还不错，所以一直想抽个时间把这个弄成框架模版开源出来！后面断断续续的开发，今天终于发布了第一个版本🎉🎉🎉，欢迎体验~</p>
<h2 data-id="heading-1">🌴 介绍</h2>
<p><code>snail-uni</code> - 专为开发者打造的 <a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Funiapp.dcloud.net.cn%2F" target="_blank" title="https://uniapp.dcloud.net.cn/" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">Uni-App</a> 框架模板。 基于 <code>UniApp + Vue3 + TypeScript + Vite + Wot Design Uni</code> 的高效框架模板。它内置了 <code>Snail-Uni</code> 脚手架工具，帮助您快速创建 <code>TypeScript</code> 或 <code>JavaScript</code> 版本项目。<code>Snail-Uni</code> 配备了丰富的开箱即用配置，让您从一开始就拥有高效的开发体验。</p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fhu-snail.github.io%2Fsnail-uni%2F" target="_blank" title="https://hu-snail.github.io/snail-uni/" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">官网文档</a></li>
<li><a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2Fhu-snail%2Fsnail-uni" target="_blank" title="https://github.com/hu-snail/snail-uni" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">github地址</a></li>
<li><a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fgitee.com%2Fhu-snail%2Fsnail-uni" target="_blank" title="https://gitee.com/hu-snail/snail-uni" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">gitee地址</a></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-id="heading-2">💻 特性</h2>
<ul>
<li>使用 <code>Vue3</code> + <code>Vite5</code> + <code>Ts</code> 等最新技术栈构建</li>
<li>采用 <code>pnpm</code> + <code>Monorepo</code> 模式构建</li>
<li>路由自动注册，无需手动配置路由，同时集成了<code>Uni Mini Router</code>路由插件系统</li>
<li>集成 <code>Oxlint</code> + <code>Eslint</code> 最新的代码规范，更高效的检测代码质量</li>
<li>宇宙最强编辑器<code>Vscode</code>，告别HBuilderX</li>
<li>支持<code>uni-app</code>、<code>vue3</code>、<code>pinia</code>、<code>uni mini router</code>自动导入</li>
<li>支持<code>微信云开发</code>（后续更新）</li>
</ul>
<h2 data-id="heading-3">✍️ 前置准备</h2>
<ul>
<li><strong>Node.js</strong> 18 及以上版本</li>
<li><strong>pnpm</strong> - <code>&gt;=8.15.6</code>（推荐使用 <code>9.0.0</code>）</li>
<li><a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fcode.visualstudio.com%2F" target="_blank" title="https://code.visualstudio.com/" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">VSCode</a> 开发工具下载</li>
<li><a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.dcloud.io%2Fhbuilderx.html" target="_blank" title="https://www.dcloud.io/hbuilderx.html" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">HBuilderX</a> - <code>APP</code> 的运行和发布需要</li>
<li><a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fgit-scm.com%2Fdownload" target="_blank" title="https://git-scm.com/download" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">Git</a> 安装</li>
</ul>
<blockquote>
<p>Snail-uni 要求 <a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fnodejs.org%2Fen%2F" target="_blank" title="https://nodejs.org/en/" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">Node.js</a> 版本 <code>18+</code> 或者 <code>20+</code>. 请注意升级你的 <code>Node.js</code> 版本！否则会导致项目无法正常运行！</p>
</blockquote>
<h2 data-id="heading-4">🌿 使用</h2>
<p><code>snail-uni</code> 附带一个命令行创建向导，可以帮助你构建一个基本项目。支持创建 <code>js</code> 与 <code>ts</code> 让你无需纠结。</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-bash" lang="bash"><span class="hljs-comment"># npm</span>
npm create snail-uni
<span class="hljs-comment"># pnpm</span>
npm create snail-uni
<span class="hljs-comment"># yarn</span>
yarn create snail-uni
<span class="hljs-comment"># bun</span>
bun create snail-uni
</code></pre>
<p>将需要回答几个简单的问题：</p>
<p><img src="https://p3-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/9f5681575b0b44168e3b00fd7f8bc426~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg6JyX54mb5YmN56uv:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1743192776&amp;x-signature=wEFA2noYncNoOSkNkW6vYD765vM%3D" alt="WechatIMG450.jpg" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>你还可以通过附加的命令行选项直接指定项目名称和你想要使用的模板, 例如：
不指定类型默认为 <code>js</code> 版本且其他都默认关闭！支持两种创建语法：</p>
<h3 data-id="heading-5">🌱 方式一</h3>
<p>npm create snail-uni <code>&lt;project-name&gt; --t &lt;template-name 模板名称&gt; --ui &lt;ui库（Wot-Design/Uv-ui/Uview-plus/TuniaoUI&gt; --lint &lt;yes/no）&gt;</code></p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-sh" lang="sh"><span class="hljs-comment"># npm</span>
npm create snail-uni my-snail-app --t uni-ts --ui Uv-ui  --lint <span class="hljs-built_in">yes</span>
<span class="hljs-comment">#pnpm</span>
pnpm create snail-uni my-snail-app --t uni-ts --ui Uv-ui  --lint <span class="hljs-built_in">yes</span>
<span class="hljs-comment">#yarn</span>
yarn create snail-uni my-snail-app --t uni-ts --ui Uv-ui  --lint <span class="hljs-built_in">yes</span>
<span class="hljs-comment">#bun</span>
bun create snail-uni my-snail-app --t uni-ts --ui Uv-ui  --lint <span class="hljs-built_in">yes</span>
</code></pre>
<ul>
<li>支持以下模板：<code>uni-ts</code>、<code>uni-tabbar-ts</code>、<code>uni-js</code>、<code>uni-tabbar-js</code></li>
<li>支持以下ui库：<code>Wot-Design</code>、<code>Uv-ui</code>、<code>Uview-plus</code>、<code>TuniaoUI</code></li>
</ul>
<h3 data-id="heading-6">🌱 方式二</h3>
<p>npm create snail-uni <code>&lt;project-name&gt; &lt;语言类型（js/ts）&gt; &lt;是否使用（tabbar/no)&gt; &lt;是否使用代码检查（eslint/no）&gt; &lt;ui库（Wot-Design/Uv-ui/Uview-plus/TuniaoUI）&gt;</code></p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-sh" lang="sh"><span class="hljs-comment">#npm </span>
npm create snail-uni snail-uni-app ts tabbar eslint
<span class="hljs-comment">#pnpm</span>
pnpm create snail-uni snail-uni-app ts tabbar eslint
<span class="hljs-comment">#yarn</span>
yarn create snail-uni snail-uni-app ts tabbar eslint
<span class="hljs-comment">#bun</span>
bun create snail-uni snail-uni-app ts tabbar eslint
</code></pre>
<p>执行完之后，将生成一个<code>uni-app</code>的项目,使用<code>vscode</code>开发工具打开</p>
<p><img src="https://p3-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/88734693c22b40b5b88a4d07c18c4b28~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg6JyX54mb5YmN56uv:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1743192776&amp;x-signature=gI9Be26fyvbvB3c106SxO%2BlJSzg%3D" alt="WechatIMG451.jpg" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-id="heading-7">💻 启动并运行</h2>
<p><code>snail-uni</code> 启动运行脚本在<code>package.json</code>中配置：</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-json" lang="json"><span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span>
  ...
  <span class="hljs-attr">"scripts"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span>
    <span class="hljs-attr">"dev"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"uni -p mp-weixin"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
    <span class="hljs-attr">"dev:h5"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"uni"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
    <span class="hljs-attr">"build"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"uni build -p mp-weixin"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
    <span class="hljs-attr">"build:h5"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"uni build"</span>
    ...
  <span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  ...
<span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span>
</code></pre>
<p><code>dev</code> 脚本将启动具有即时热更新的本地开发服务器。使用以下命令运行它：</p>
<blockquote>
<p>默认启动微信小程序,根据自己需求在<code>package.json</code> 中进行调整</p>
</blockquote></div></div>
